course.subject: CHEM
course.name: Physical Chemistry I: Equilibrium Thermodynamics and Statistical Mechanics
course.description: The course consists of two parts. The first part teaches the equilibrium thermodynamics, covering the laws of thermodynamics and thermodynamics functions, with applications to various problems in phase equilibrium, chemical and electrochemical equilibrium. The second part teaches the equilibrium statistical thermodynamics, covering the Boltzmann distribution, the statistical ensembles and partition functions and their relations to thermodynamics functions. For CHEM students or students with instructor's approval.
course.prerequisites: CHEM 1030 AND (CHEM 2409 OR MATH 2351)

reviews.author: YareYaredaze
reviews.title: 高中冇讀過phys可以入嚟睇睇
reviews.comment_content:
Midterm:
Chapter 1-4
Final:
Chapter 5,6,12

TLDR: 大部份content 都係gen chem 提過，不過依家滲左啲calculus 同埋講下條式點樣嚟咁解。難度係極端版過山車，大起小跌 :) Edit#2: You dont need a physics background to study this course, ofc it would help a lot if you have.

textbook: Atkins, P.; de Paula, J. “Physical Chemistry” 10th Ed., Oxford University Press, 2014. (or 9th Ed, 2011)

講講midterm先，

Chapter 1 : 一開始都係講講PV=nRT， 再"d"下佢咁，(e.g. dp/dn = RT/V ) ，同埋成個course最重要既單位轉換 (e.g. J = Pa m^3)，考試前一定要熟。

ch1 中尾段就嚟一個大boss，講Kinetic theory of temperature，一下嚟左momentum同Force去derive條式，強烈建議備課，事後睇Textbook解釋後易明好多。(唔使太驚住，momentum呢啲都係輕輕帶過，求其睇youtube 片明一明基本原理就ok，之後唔再提)
&last, virial equation and van der Waals Equation.

Chapter 2: 講internal energy, work 同heat。開頭講△U = w + q 再d下佢，expansion work dw = -pdV 喺唔同situation應該點轉式，做過就識。

跟住講下Heat Capacity Cv, Cp , enthalpy  H≡U +pV 既derivatives+integration... 學完 enthalpy 會即講 adiabatic expansion (個proof 都幾痴線)。然後就kirchhoff's law ，少少 exact 同partial differential (不太難)。

ch2尾段個難度又係直線上升，將partial differential 左既 internal energy "U" 同 enthalpy "H" 條式既 variables define 做唔同既野，本節lecture獎品獎金非常豐富，其中包括Expansion Coefficient、isothermal compressibility、isothermal Joule-Thomson Coefficient以及Joule-Thomson Coefficient。呢度個人認為係成個course 第三難既內容( 是的，只係第三難)

Chapter3:  Entropy, Helmholtz energy and gibbs energy. 開頭帶幾條式出嚟比大家拎返個手感先，e.g. dS = dq(rev) /T，boltzmann formula S = kb lnW。

之後就開心啦，講heat engine，講carnot cycle 點proof，講energy efficiency、clausius inequality，然後試下entropy喺唔同Expansion 既情況下點搞，bla bla bla,,, 講下helmholtz energy 同gibbs energy點出嚟的，學完就知雪櫃原理。

最尾就maxwell relation，又係好難好難，不過考試唔太出，所以唔提了，maxwell relation之後有個好重要既Gibbs-Helmholtz equation，喺midterm後都經常出現。

Chapter 4: Phase Transformation(inorganic 1 會提下)、phase rule F = C - P + 2，中後期適量justifications，令你知道liquid 去gas 呀、solid 去 liquid 呀d phase transition用咩equation咁，呢度近assignment deadline 同midterm，所以要取捨下。

Final: 開始趕，d in lecture practice唔再講太多。

Chapter5: "simple" mixtures, gibbs energy of mixing, Raoult's law, henry's law, boiling elevation 、freezing point depression、solubility 、osmosis咁，我會話呢到同chapter2 尾差唔多，但midterm(佔多過final test )完左成個人鬆左啲，叫做第四難。

中後開始爆炸，Lever's Rule，liquid-liquid, solid-liquid phase diagram，仲有activity , debye-Huckel Limiting Law，PHASE DIAGRAM 好難好難，有d concept我去到最尾都唔太知佢想點(因為開始趕，prof 要rush rush) 呢度係成個course 第二難既位

Chapter 6: Equilibrium
將K、Qapply 落cell reaction 到，提返nernst equation 咁，叫做有得唞氣，難度合理

Chapter 12: Statistical Thermodynamics (本course 最難既位)
最主要係冇時間温(教完隔幾日即考)
& SKIP太多野教(問過TA佢話應該要讀左前面幾課先咁呢課stat先唔會咁難)
emm，不過考試出既題目全部同佢assignment 有關，所以還接受到啦...

reviews.comment_teaching:
I think Prof. Halpert might be the best professor in the chem department for teaching. His English is fluent (kinda obvious as he's American) and he can stick down to only the necessary contents for learning physical chemistry.

But for chapter 12, seems the Professor really enjoys talking about stat mechanics but most of the students seem to suffer deeply. This is mostly for the insanely hard course contents, not the teaching.

Believe me, you'll be convinced why Boltzmann killed himself when you learn about the Boltzmann distribution in chapter 12.

reviews.author: Kolf
reviews.title: 學渣Chem2410速通手冊
reviews.comment_content:
呢個課程最主要都係講物理同埋數學，所以如果你冇講過物理或者數底弱嘅人建議你哋認真看待呢個課程。

Chapter 1:
Review of Gas Law

呢一個部份基本上重温番Ideal Gas Law，啫係PV=nRT，比較簡單，不過都係為後面個幾課打底，所以唔好掉以輕心。

Chapter 2:
The First Law ( of Thermodynamics )

開始入正題，呢一課會介紹Work，而且開始會有好多數，特別係Intergration，不過大部份Lecture Notes啲數都係解釋點解會有條咁嘅公式，唔使背咗佢。
呢課會講Enthalpy同Internal Energy。Enthalpy係中學學過，所以比較簡單。Internal Energy就係新嘢，不過同Enthalpy好似，所以都唔太難理解。

Chapter 3:
The Second Law ( of Thermodynamics )

難的部份開始，呢個部份會講Entropy同埋Gibbs Free Energy，有一大堆嘢要記，同埋啲公式會好複雜。我個排冇上到Lecture，結果做功課時要做好大堆Research先搞掂。

Chapter 4:
Physical Transformation of Pure Substances

呢一課會講Triple Point, Melting Point, Phase Boundary等等的東西。後面會教到Vapour Pressure，有少少難明但係整體都唔太難，數學比前面少啲。

Chapter 5:
Simple Mixture

呢兩課會講Raoult's Law同埋Henry's Law。
綜合埋第四課的內容做個大升級。
呢一課我讀得好痛苦，因為Lecture Notes好多嘢都唔明。

Chapter 6:
Chemical Equilibrium

呢課講Equilibrium，不過因為過咗Mid-term的關係，內容比較支離破碎。

Chapter 12:
Statiscal Thermodynamics

從統計學上去研究化學動能等等。內容有Boltzmann Equation同埋Probability等等。

reviews.comment_workload:
成個Semester有7份功課
作為一個唔經常上堂、數底又頗弱嘅學生，係Deadline前兩日開始做基本上都能夠攞到滿分。

教完123課之後就會有一個Mid-term，主要考番你啲數咁樣，有做功課的課基本上十拿九穩。如果Mid-term考得好，後期基本上可以唔使放太多Effort落呢科，因為你可以唔使考Final。

後期有一份Project Video要做，要從第4、5、6、12課中選一個題目做分析拍片，你只要熟其中一個課題就可以了。因為我對呢幾課都好陌生，所以有一段時間都唔知點樣做至好，不過最後發現你言之成理就可以了。例如我揀咗Chemical Equilibrium嚟做，揀咗個會reversible reaction嘅substance做主題，之後抄番Lecture Notes嘅數學論證，就攞到Mean，贏哂！

reviews.comment_grading:
What I want to say is,  he is a really good Prof given that:
1) He provided past papers (ard 2-3 copies) with solutions (Tho no MCQ given)

2) Many exercise given. (Examples in lecture notes, HW, Past paper)

3) Most of the long questions in midterm were modified from HWs/lecture notes!!!!!!!! If you did the HW on your own, you must know how to do the long Q at midterm since he only changed the numbers in the questions. (tbh, some of my classmates said they can find the same questions with steps provided on different numerical numbers in the textbook during the midterm...)

4) You can choose to SKIP the final which was great since the latter part of the course was really hard. I know very little about it, and the pressure towards final was relived. JEH will let you know your total score of the course before the finals, so you can decide to take the final or not base on your current scores.

reviews.comment_workload:
The workload is quite heavy compared to other CHEM course due to the fact:

1) 6 HWs each with 1 week of notice. JEH likes to have 2 days of buffer with no consequence, which HELPS A LOT. (Basically extending your deadline for 2 days automatically)  But the good thing is that he marks down the question number from the textbook questions that he is referring to in the HW question file. You can simply find the solution to these questions with the solution manual. It applies to all 6 HWs :)))

2) Video making towards the end of the semester (Wk12-13). You need to think of a topic by yourself from the 4 categories provided by JEH + making a PPT with no more than 10 slides + video taking (6 mins max.)

3) Tutorial after each HW submissions. The duration should be 1hr but it always overrun and become 1.5hr tutorial.

It is not weighted as a D grade due to the fact that I can skip the exam + find solutions of HW easily.
